I "discovered" Screenshot a little over a year ago and decided to buy a shirt. I figured it would be a "run of the mill" screen print shirt. What I got was a million times better. It was an actual embroidered patch and a sewn on button eye. The entire "build" of the shirt was so far above and beyond my expectations. So I instantly got back online an order a hoodie and another shirt. Then later ordered another two color hoodie and saw this shirt (I love the color block look) and this shirt, just like all other clothing I've ordered from them is 100%. I've actually gotten compliments on the shirt! I will continue to follow their product line and order from them.
